attributes.action: Keep British Benefit Money in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Being in touch and understanding what it means to live in a benefit state I want the Government to now force the issue in the house to keep DWP money in this country and to ensure tighter guild lines are put in place to ensure that people are not defrauding the system as it seems everyone is doing by sending it back and abusing the system of hard working British People who pay tax in order to support the welfare system. Time now for a change please sign we muse stop this.
